ing: 6 green olives stuffed with blue cheese
1/4 teaspoon olive juice (adjust to personal taste)
des: "My father and uncle (see 'Dan Fay Martini') loved their martini's. Having sampled both of their recipes, more than once, I found myself making variations to their wonderful concoctions. Here is my latest variation in the tradition of the 'Fay Martini.'"
ins:
Gin and glasses must be kept chilled in freezer.
Measure and pour gin into glasses.
Add 1/4 teaspoon olive juice to each glass.
Garnish each glass with 3 speared green olives stuffed with Blue Cheese.
CHEERS!
